Thomas Pink accepts the following forms of payment for online orders:

  • American Express
  • Mastercard
  • Visa
  • PayPal
  • Apple Pay

Thomas Pink utilises Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to encrypt and protect the data you send to us over the internet. This assists us with providing you a safe and secure shopping experience.

All payments are processed by a secure third party fully certified for industry security standards including PSD2, SCA and PCI.

Please note that for your security, Thomas Pink does not store your card details.

Due to operational updates, there may be delays in some order fulfilment.

Note that UK Next Day Delivery service excludes public holidays, and orders placed Thursday after 3 pm will be delivered the following Tuesday.

Additionally, some postcodes in the Scottish Highlands or based outside of the UK Mainland may not be viable for DPD next day service. Excluded postcodes below:

AB31-56, BF (all), HS (all), IM (all), IV (all), KA27-28, KW (all), PA20-80, PH15-50, TR21-25, ZE (all), GY (all), JE (all).

INTERNATIONAL DELIVERY

We offer Standard Delivery and Express Delivery for selected international orders. Delivery costs will be worked out at checkout, after you input your country and address. If you experience any issues with tracking your order, please reach out to us via email at customerservice@thomaspink.com

For further information, visit our FAQs.
